alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Northern Worcester; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 8:23PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Essex, northeastern Worcester and northeastern Middlesex Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 823 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chelmsford, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lawrence, Haverhill, Peabody, Methuen, Billerica, Beverly, Chelmsford, Andover, Dracut, Tewksbury, Gloucester, North Andover, Danvers, Reading, Burlington, Wilmington, Westford, Acton, and Concord. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Northern Worcester; Western Essex
